languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы согласитесь, что разовый простой в работах в перспективе окупится спасенными жизнями и эффективностью труда, страдающей во время вспышек хвори. А также затратами на стимуляторы, которыми больные компенсируют упавшую работоспособность".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, вы согласитесь, что разовый простой в работах в перспективе окупится с лихвой — не только спасенными жизнями, но и эффективностью труда, страдающей во время вспышек хвори, а также затратами на стимуляторы, которыми больные компенсируют упавшую работоспособность".

languages.text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вы согласитесь, что разовый простой в работах в перспективе окупится спасенными жизнями и эффективностью труда, страдающей во время вспышек хвори. А также затратами на стимуляторы, которыми больные компенсируют упавшую работоспособность".

traits.locale_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants because the afflicted are using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

languages.text: « Avouez qu'une brève interruption de nos opérations est un faible prix à payer eu égard au nombre de vies que nous pourrons sauver et à l'augmentation des performances de l'équipage lors des épidémies à venir. Sans oublier que nous n'aurons plus à dilapider les stimulants dont les malades se gavent actuellement pour compenser leur capacité de travail limitée. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

traits.locale_text: « Avouez qu'une brève interruption de nos opérations est un faible prix à payer eu égard au nombre de vies que nous pourrons sauver et à l'augmentation des performances de l'équipage lors des épidémies à venir. Sans oublier que nous n'aurons plus à dilapider les stimulants dont les malades se gavent actuellement pour compenser leur capacité de travail limitée. »

languages.text: «Espero que esté de acuerdo en que un único periodo de inactividad es un pequeño precio que pagar por el número de vidas que vamos a salvar y el aumento del rendimiento que tendrá la tripulación durante futuros brotes. Por no mencionar que no tendremos que malgastar estimulantes, los infectados los utilizan a modo de apoyo para compensar su limitada capacidad de trabajo».
languages.original_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que esté de acuerdo en que un único periodo de inactividad es un pequeño precio que pagar por el número de vidas que vamos a salvar y el aumento del rendimiento que tendrá la tripulación durante futuros brotes. Por no mencionar que no tendremos que malgastar estimulantes, los infectados los utilizan a modo de apoyo para compensar su limitada capacidad de trabajo».

languages.text: 「たった一度の休止期間が、救われる人命の数や、今後このような事態が発生した際の乗組員のパフォーマンス向上につながることを考えれば、お安いものだと納得いただけると思います。もちろん、病気にかかった者が労働能力の低下を補うために覚せい剤を松葉づえのように使っていたのも、これで無駄にする必要がなくなることは言うまでもないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

traits.locale_text: 「たった一度の休止期間が、救われる人命の数や、今後このような事態が発生した際の乗組員のパフォーマンス向上につながることを考えれば、お安いものだと納得いただけると思います。もちろん、病気にかかった者が労働能力の低下を補うために覚せい剤を松葉づえのように使っていたのも、これで無駄にする必要がなくなることは言うまでもないでしょう」

languages.text: “我希望您能理解，为了拯救更多的船员，同时为今后类似的病症爆发做好准备，仅仅隔离一段时间的代价实在是微不足道。除此之外，这样的做法也可以节省兴奋剂，因为那些病人会依靠兴奋剂来弥补工作能力的不足。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

traits.locale_text: “我希望您能理解，为了拯救更多的船员，同时为今后类似的病症爆发做好准备，仅仅隔离一段时间的代价实在是微不足道。除此之外，这样的做法也可以节省兴奋剂，因为那些病人会依靠兴奋剂来弥补工作能力的不足。”

languages.text: "Ich hoffe Ihr stimmt mir zu, dass eine kurze Ausfallzeit ein geringer Preis für all die Leben ist, die wir dadurch retten können ... und die Leistungsfähigkeit der Crew bei zukünftigen Ausbrüchen. Ganz zu schweigen von der Tatsache, dass wir die Betroffenen nicht mehr mit Stimulanzien versorgen müssten, um ihre eingeschränkte Leistungsfähigkeit zu kompensieren."
languages.original_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe Ihr stimmt mir zu, dass eine kurze Ausfallzeit ein geringer Preis für all die Leben ist, die wir dadurch retten können ... und die Leistungsfähigkeit der Crew bei zukünftigen Ausbrüchen. Ganz zu schweigen von der Tatsache, dass wir die Betroffenen nicht mehr mit Stimulanzien versorgen müssten, um ihre eingeschränkte Leistungsfähigkeit zu kompensieren."

languages.text: "Umuyorum ki kısa bir aksama yaşanacak bu sürenin, kurtarılacak hayat sayısına kıyasla ufak bir bedel olduğu ve gelecekteki olası salgınlar esnasında mürettebatın performansını artıracağı hususunda hemfikirsinizdir. Hastaların sınırlı iş kapasitelerini desteklemek maksadıyla uyarıcı kullanmayacağı, böylece uyarıcıları boşa harcamamıza gerek kalmayacağı hususu da cabası."
languages.original_text: "I hope you will agree that a single period of downtime is a small price to pay for the number of lives that will be saved and the increase in the crew's performance during other such outbreaks in the future. Not to mention the fact that we won't have to waste stimulants due to the afflicted using them as a crutch to offset their limited work capacity."
